Grouped_Utterances: It was pretty good! I managed to write a little bit of new material. It felt really satisfying. I hadn’t realized how much I missed it. Not yet, but I’m planning to. I want to be ready before I go. I try to remind myself that everyone is there to enjoy themselves, not to judge. I have! I’ve been jotting down ideas that come to me while watching. I think it’s about being able to perform regularly and make people laugh.
Yes, I reached out to another friend, and we chatted for a bit.  It was nice. We talked about some funny experiences we’ve had. It made me laugh. I hope so. I feel more connected.

I’ve started to, but it’s still a work in progress.  I’ve been trying to shut my laptop by 7 PM. I’ve had more time to relax and even watch some shows. I started watching a comedy series that’s been really funny.

I’ve considered some breathing exercises.  Let’s take a deep breath in through the nose… hold for a moment… and now exhale slowly through your mouth.  Let’s do that a couple more times. Inhale… hold… and exhale. One more time.  Of course! Remember to keep practicing those breathing exercises, and enjoy your creative journey.
Maybe I can treat myself after each performance?
